abstract: Advertising column highlights Macy's new campaign for the Christmas shopping season; notes that character Kris Kringle, version of Santa Claus portrayed by Edmund Gwenn in 1947 film Miracle on 34th Street, has a starring role.
lead_paragraph: Kris Kringle, played by the actor Edmund Gwenn, has a starring role in the retailer’s new campaign.
